description: Expert-level integrated system design with thermal, EMI, and multi-domain optimization

problems.prompt: Tokamak Central Solenoid Fast Discharge: Fusion reactor requiring controlled energy extraction during plasma disruption
problems.application: Fusion reactor requiring controlled energy extraction during plasma disruption

problems.prompt: Inertial Confinement Fusion Pulse Power: NIF-class laser requiring multi-MJ capacitor bank charging system
constraints: 3 MJ capacitor bank charge in 300 s
problems.application: NIF-class laser requiring multi-MJ capacitor bank charging system

problems.prompt: Quantum Dot Display Backlight Driver: 8K quantum dot display requiring precision LED backlight power for HDR
constraints: PWM dimming at 480 Hz for video sync
problems.application: 8K quantum dot display requiring precision LED backlight power for HDR

problems.prompt: Mars Helicopter Rotor Motor Drive: Mars rotorcraft requiring high-power motor drives in 1% Earth atmospheric density
problems.application: Mars rotorcraft requiring high-power motor drives in 1% Earth atmospheric density

problems.prompt: Particle Detector Silicon Tracker Bias: LHC-class detector requiring silicon strip/pixel detector bias power
constraints: Leakage current limiting for irradiated sensors
Ramp rate control for sensor protection
problems.application: LHC-class detector requiring silicon strip/pixel detector bias power

problems.prompt: Superconducting Magnetic Energy Storage Interface: Grid-scale SMES requiring bidirectional power converter for energy storage
constraints: 1 ms response time for grid support
problems.application: Grid-scale SMES requiring bidirectional power converter for energy storage

problems.prompt: Atomic Magnetometer Array Power: MEG brain imaging system requiring ultra-low-noise sensor array power
constraints: Magnetic noise < 10 fT/√Hz for brain signal
Zero magnetic signature from power supply
problems.application: MEG brain imaging system requiring ultra-low-noise sensor array power

problems.prompt: Compact Muon Solenoid Upgrade Power: HL-LHC detector upgrade requiring high-density power distribution
problems.application: HL-LHC detector upgrade requiring high-density power distribution

problems.application: Cislunar space station requiring 50 kW power distribution from solar arrays

problems.prompt: Extreme Ultraviolet Solar Imager Power: Solar observation satellite requiring stable power for EUV imaging instruments
problems.application: Solar observation satellite requiring stable power for EUV imaging instruments
